neighborhoods.Description: These districts have a mix of commercial and residential properties, and are known for their museums and cultural institutions.
Diverse neighborhoods known for their vibrant street art, unique eateries, and dynamic nightlife.
These neighborhoods offer a relaxed pace of life, tree-lined streets, and are known for their organic food markets and family-friendly atmosphere.
These areas were once industrial and are now known for their creative scenes, with many startups, artists, and musicians.
Affluent and primarily residential areas known for their grand architecture, high-end boutiques, and well-maintained public parks.
